answers.answer: Im 33 wks 5 days and feel like that now
I'm like ughhhh it was bad then but I'm 37+1 and now its even worst not to mention thinking I went into labor to only be told 12 hours later it was false labor -_- my body better be preparing lol
I'm also due July 30th but no sickness right now my feet and ankles stay pretty swollen though.
I feel exactly the same. Due the 25th. I feel like no matter what I do I wanna throw up.

I feel that way too I'm due on the 30th. I was also just put on bedrest yesterday bc of my swollen feet/ankles/legs/hands and super high bp, plus contractions are bothering me. I can't wait to have my baby!!! It'll be nice to feel normal again lol

Normal... Haha I laugh at that word. Will we ever feel normal. Soontobemommy good luck preeclampsia is horrible they emitted me in the hospital over night just because I was borderline preeclampsia. It's scary... Angibaby I had a sick free pregnancy for the most part. So this feeling like crap stuff is getting to me.
Alot of July 30th babies thats my due date too and I feel the same way im so tired all the time!! I feel like I can hardly stay awake throughout the day!
I'm due on the 29th. I'm right their with all you mommas; in bed, swollen legs, feet, and hands. We are almost there!!
I'm n bed now lol just thinking about how my body feels like it did during the 1st trimester

I too know the feeling. I'm only 31 weeks and have had a great sick free pregnancy up until a few days ago with the preeclamsia scare. They admitted me because I was borderline with high blood pressure. I passed all the lab work. After spending 2 nights and3 days in the hospital I'm just ready to be done already. They will be taking my baby early.

question: I am due July 30th and I have been really really fatigued. I can't be out for more than 2 hours without feeling like I've been out all day. I constantly feel that slight sick feeling and just want to lay down. Please July mommies tell me I am not the only one... I am currently writing this post from bed.
title: how is everyone coping
